Package gr.uoa.di.NmapProject.AM.DB

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Admin
    Class representing an administrator of the A.M..
    AdminDAO
    Class that manages the database access for the administrator account changes.
    AdminPanelDAO
    Database access class for the Administrator Panel window.
    DB
    The class that holds all the info for connection to the database.
    Job
    A class holding a job's info.
    JobDAO
    Data Access Class for queries for jobs
    Result
    Results of a job
    ResultDAO
    Data Access class for result related queries
    SA
    SAs information
    SADAO
    Data Access Class for all the SA related queries
    SAInfoStatus
    SAs information (again :P)
